overview_description.description: Holiferm is bringing biosurfactants to market and is in the process of building a ktonne scale sophorolipid manufacturing plant.

properties.growth_insight_description: Holiferm may be growing as it has secured significant funding, specifically €21.4 million, to manufacture sustainable biosurfactants. This influx of capital indicates an expansion of operations and an increase in the company's financial resources, which are critical for growth. The investment will likely be used to scale up production capabilities and possibly fund research and development, which are essential for a company in the biotechnology and chemical industries to maintain a competitive edge.

about_short_description.short_description: Holiferm develops holistically improved fermentation technology for massive economic improvements.

product.name: Sophorolipid Biosurfactants
product.description: Holiferm produces sophorolipid biosurfactants for use in personal care, home care, industrial cleaning, and agriculture applications.

product.name: Integrated Gravity Separation Technology
product.description: Holiferm's patented technology enhances the efficiency of biosurfactant production through continuous fermentation processes.

product.name: Biosurfactant Product Development
product.description: The company is expanding its biosurfactant portfolio beyond sophorolipids, aiming to commercialize new biosurfactant molecules.

product.name: Commercial Scale Production
product.description: Holiferm operates a commercial plant for large-scale production of sophorolipid biosurfactants, with plans for significant capacity expansion.

product.name: Research and Development
product.description: Holiferm's R&D facility focuses on refining manufacturing methods for sophorolipids and other biosurfactants, aiming for commercial launch.
